snippet.title: Whirlight - No Time To Trip. Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
The TIME has come! We're proud to present Whirlight: No Time To Trip!

From the creators of Willy Morgan, Whirlight is a new hilarious, riveting point-and-click adventure: join Hector and Margaret on an adventure that'll span beyond the boundaries of time and space!

Wishlist now and get ready for an unforgettable TRIP!
https://bit.ly/42xKPD8

or follow us on Facebook
https://www.facebook.com/Whirlight/

#WhirlightGame #NoTimeToTrip
